name: DUEL KINKS
description:
DUEL KINKS is a Parody Adult Game based on the show Yu-Gi-Oh!
The game is Half a card game, Half a visual novel adventure where the player needs find ways to have fun with girls around a city that is a little too much obsessed with said card game.

Beautiful storyline of a shy short boy who's getting into girls panties with the help of chad pharaoh   
Build your own deck with over 90 cards and 20 fusion cards  
Show girls how good you are with your Deck  
Animated lewd scenes
